1.title: Episode #2.1

episode of.title: How'd You Get So Rich? (TV Series 2009–2010)

1.plot: Joan's got not one, but two billionaires: first a homeless bum who became a hair care mogul. Then, it's off to the top of Trump Tower to visit her old boss (from Celebrity Apprentice) Donald Trump.

2.title: Episode #2.2

episode of.title: How'd You Get So Rich? (TV Series 2009–2010)

2.plot: Joan Rivers visits the high school dropout who came up with a 100 million dollar idea while working at a pet shop: Wee Wee Pads! Then, Joan shows and tells all in the first-ever televised tour of her 100-acre Connecticut estate.

3.title: Episode #2.3

episode of.title: How'd You Get So Rich? (TV Series 2009–2010)

3.plot: Joan Rivers meets five mega-millionaires who reveal the outrageous ways they spend their fortunes: exotic cars and jewelry, extreme vacations and a party house featuring a disco sauna!

4.title: Episode #2.4

episode of.title: How'd You Get So Rich? (TV Series 2009–2010)

4.plot: Joan Rivers tours a Georgia estate with a private 18-hole golf course and meets a mom who made millions as the "Leonardo da Vinci" of custom cakes.

5.title: Episode #2.5

episode of.title: How'd You Get So Rich? (TV Series 2009–2010)

5.plot: Joan Rivers tours a pharmacy tycoon's Hamptons waterfront estate and gets an invitation to the Tennessee mansion owned by the creator of the Mrs. Fields cookie franchise.

6.title: Episode #2.6

episode of.title: How'd You Get So Rich? (TV Series 2009–2010)

6.plot: Joan Rivers meets five mega-millionaires who reveal the outrageous ways they spend their fortunes: exotic cars and jewelry, extreme vacations and a party house featuring a disco sauna!

1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: How'd You Get So Rich? (TV Series 2009–2010)

1.plot: A jaw-dropping mansion with six kitchens. An ultramodern palace in the hills. Would you believe that they belong to one guy who used to scrub toilets, and one who folded sweaters in the mall? Joan gets the rags-to-riches stories.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: How'd You Get So Rich? (TV Series 2009–2010)

2.plot: Joan meets the Mardi Gras Millionaire, who went from penniless to parade float king. Wait till you see how he lives: You're in for a major shock. Then, it's on to the Versace Mansion, an over-the-top palace... owned by a man who dropped out of school!

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: How'd You Get So Rich? (TV Series 2009–2010)

3.plot: It slices. It dices. It makes billions of dollars! It?s the amazing infomercial, and Joan?s paying a visit to the Infomercial King. She?ll also meet a woman who was dumped by her rich husband?but then got rich herself, with camouflage makeup.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: How'd You Get So Rich? (TV Series 2009–2010)

4.plot: Joan meets the inventor of the five-chamber bubble blower, who is so rich, his dog has a walk-in closet and a private chef. Then, this couple's mansion has its own elevator. Her diamond has its own zip code. How'd they get so rich? Watch and find out.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: How'd You Get So Rich? (TV Series 2009–2010)

5.plot: Joan meets a fashion junkie who spends over $1 million on clothes - a year! Then, the inventors of Butt Paste and The Slanket. And, a couple who were so broke, they served pizza at their wedding. Now they're worth billions. How'd they get so rich?

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: How'd You Get So Rich? (TV Series 2009–2010)

6.plot: He grew up with dirt floors and no running water. Now he has his own ballroom to dance in and take dips in his indoor pool. Joan finds out how he got so rich. Then, a former ad exec who became a decorator and is now decorating his own castle!

imdb.title: How'd You Get So Rich?
akas: How'd You Get So Rich? (United States)
plot: Series revolves around Joan Rivers traveling around the United States interviewing self-made millionaires and billionaires.::Anonymous
